paper_abstract: We discover that two distinct efficient endomorphisms can both exist on some Galbraith-Lin-Scott (GLS) elliptic curves Galbraith et al. (2009) [4]. By using them we generalize the Gallant-Lambert-Vanstone (GLV) method Gallant et al. (2001) [5] for faster point multiplication on these curves to dimension 3, and give some implementation result which shows that our 3-dimensional GLV (3GLV) method runs in 0.897 the time of 2-dimensional GLV (2GLV) method as Galbraith et al. did in Galbraith et al. (2009) [4] for the point multiplication on these curves. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Efficient 3-dimensional GLV method for faster point multiplication on some GLS elliptic curves
